homeHeader.title: Launch, Trade, & Scale Your Web3 or Blockchain Venture in RAK Digital Asset Oasis
homeHeader.description: Enter the world's #1 Free Zone tailored for digital and virtual asset companies to unlock modern infrastructure, state-of-the-art incubation centers, and start-up friendly business policies. Our expert business consultants streamline all the paperwork to ensure you're at the forefront of the UAE's next digital revolution.

leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify RAK DAO Setup in 5 Simple Steps

items.title: Pick a Business Activity
items.description: We'll start with a brief call to gain a deep understanding of your products or services and business needs to suggest the ideal activity.

items.title: Reserve a Unique Name
items.description: Next, our experts will help you select the best-fit legal entity and guide you in creating and registering a trade name.

items.title: Collect & Attest Documents
items.description: We'll help you prepare the necessary documents, including passport and visa copies, corporate documents, and a business plan.

items.title: Issue a License
items.description: Our seasoned consultants will help you apply for the appropriate trade license, pay the application fees, and send it your way.

items.title: Apply for a Bank Account
items.description: We offer expert guidance beyond licensing, empowering you to apply for visa applications and create a corporate account.

items.quote: Setting up through RAK DAO was surprisingly smooth. As a crypto startup, we needed a jurisdiction that actually understood token-based business models—and this was the only one that did.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can expats set up a cryptocurrency business in RAK DAO?
items.answer: Yes, RAK DAO offers foreigners 100% strategic ownership of their business- all without the hassle of a local partner or agent.

items.question: Who can kickstart a company in the RAK Digital Assets Oasis Free Zone?
items.answer: Anyone can launch a business in RAK DAO, as long as the nature of your company aligns with the available business activities.

items.question: Do I need to rent or lease a physical office to launch my business?
items.answer: No, you can explore alternative, more cost-effective options like flexi-desks, virtual offices, and co-working spaces.

items.question: How long does it take to secure a license in the RAK DAO Free Zone?
items.answer: It typically takes 1-14 days to select the ideal business activity and issue the relevant trade license.

items.question: Can I apply for a RAK Digital Assets Oasis license remotely?
items.answer: Yes, our experts offer 100% remote business setup solutions, allowing you to launch from any corner of the world.
